text: Joap mɨdorozir sabar mam uan agharir kɨriamɨn an suira, ezɨ Amasa mɨdorozir sabar kamɨn ganizir puvatɨ. Joap Amasan navim bɨrazɨma, an muriam suiaghɨrɨgha nguazim girɨzɨ, a maghɨram areme. Ezɨ Joap uam a bɨrazir puvatɨ. Joap Amasa bɨrazɨ an aremezɨ, a uan aveghbuam Abisai ko aning Bikrin otarim Seban agɨntɨghasa ghu.
